message: I propose we divide the money in an 80-20 ratio. I believe this is fair considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'll take 60 now, but I think we can do better than 40 for you in future rounds

Considering the inflation and the previous offers, I propose we divide the money in a 75-25 ratio. This maintains a reasonable gap while accounting for the diminishing value of money in future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but 55 is too high for me. I think we can find a better balance
